<h1>Thai Massage: An Ancient Healing Art</h1>

<p>Thai massage, also known as Nuad Thai or Thai yoga massage, is a traditional form of bodywork that originated in Thailand over 2,500 years ago. Rooted in the principles of Buddhism, Thai massage combines acupressure, assisted yoga stretching, and deep rhythmic compression to provide a unique therapeutic experience.</p>

<h2>The Origins of Thai Massage</h2>

<p>Thai massage has its roots in Ayurveda, an ancient Indian healing system that focuses on balancing the body, mind, and spirit. It is believed that Thai massage was introduced to Thailand by a physician named Jivaka Kumar Bhaccha, who was a contemporary of the Buddha.</p>
